Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of P3-di-Imn Nb-nswt-t3wy with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with ears and a beard and joined hands in relief holding a black painted hoe and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
